name: cope + flexi - strange attractor (jewellery tile mix) spher
description: cope + flexi - strange attractor (jewellery tile mix) spher
milkdrop_raw:
MILKDROP_PRESET_VERSION=201
PSVERSION=2
PSVERSION_WARP=2
PSVERSION_COMP=2
[preset00]
fRating=5.000000
fGammaAdj=1.000
fDecay=0.925
fVideoEchoZoom=1.007

nWaveMode=7

fModWaveAlphaEnd=1.300

fShader=0.000

wave_g=0.500

wave_y=0.500

nMotionVectorsY=1.248

b2n=0.000
b3n=0.000

b3x=1.000
b1ed=0.250
wavecode_0_enabled=1
wavecode_0_samples=512
wavecode_0_sep=0
wavecode_0_bSpectrum=0
wavecode_0_bUseDots=1
wavecode_0_bDrawThick=1
wavecode_0_bAdditive=0

wavecode_0_smoothing=0.50000
wavecode_0_r=1.000
wavecode_0_g=1.000
wavecode_0_b=1.000
wavecode_0_a=1.000
wave_0_init1=t1=0.5;
wave_0_init2=t2=0.5;
wave_0_per_point1=//x = a*sin(b*y) - z*cos(c*x); 
wave_0_per_point2=x = 1.4*sin(q2*t2) - t3*cos(0.5*t1);
wave_0_per_point3=
wave_0_per_point4=//y = z*sin(d*x) - cos(e*y); 
wave_0_per_point5=y = t3*sin(-q1*t1) - cos(-0.5*t2);
wave_0_per_point6=
wave_0_per_point7=//z = f*sin(x);
wave_0_per_point8=z = 1*sin(t1);
wave_0_per_point9=
wave_0_per_point10=
wave_0_per_point11=//transmit the x,y,z positions to the next point
wave_0_per_point12=t1=x;
wave_0_per_point13=t2=y;
wave_0_per_point14=t3=z;
wave_0_per_point15=
wave_0_per_point16=//adjust the scale and position of the entire attractor *after* we passed xyz to the next point
wave_0_per_point17=x = x*0.4+0.45;
wave_0_per_point18=y = y*0.4+0.8;
wave_0_per_point19=
wave_0_per_point20=r = q8;
wave_0_per_point21=b = q7;
wave_0_per_point22=g = q6;
wavecode_1_enabled=1
wavecode_1_samples=512
wavecode_1_sep=0
wavecode_1_bSpectrum=0
wavecode_1_bUseDots=0
wavecode_1_bDrawThick=0
wavecode_1_bAdditive=0
wavecode_1_scaling=1.00000
wavecode_1_smoothing=0.50000
wavecode_1_r=1.000
wavecode_1_g=1.000
wavecode_1_b=1.000
wavecode_1_a=0.070
wave_1_per_point1=
wave_1_per_point2=x = 1.4*sin(q2*t2) - t3*cos(0.5*t1);
wave_1_per_point3=y = t3*sin(-q1*t1) - cos(-0.5*t2);
wave_1_per_point4=z = 1*sin(t1);
wave_1_per_point5=
wave_1_per_point6=t1=x;
wave_1_per_point7=t2=y;
wave_1_per_point8=t3=z;
wave_1_per_point9=
wave_1_per_point10=x = x*0.4+0.45;
wave_1_per_point11=y = y*0.4+0.8;
wave_1_per_point12=
wave_1_per_point13=
wave_1_per_point14=r = q8;
wave_1_per_point15=b = q7;
wave_1_per_point16=g = q6;

shapecode_1_tex_zoom=1.00000

shapecode_1_g=0.000

shapecode_1_border_g=1.000
shapecode_1_border_b=1.000
shapecode_1_border_a=0.100

shapecode_2_sides=4
shapecode_2_additive=0
shapecode_2_thickOutline=0
shapecode_2_textured=0
shapecode_2_num_inst=1
shapecode_2_x=0.500
shapecode_2_y=0.500
shapecode_2_rad=0.10000
shapecode_2_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_zoom=1.00000

shapecode_2_g=0.000
shapecode_2_b=0.000

shapecode_2_g2=1.000
shapecode_2_b2=0.000
shapecode_2_a2=0.000
shapecode_2_border_r=1.000
shapecode_2_border_g=1.000
shapecode_2_border_b=1.000
shapecode_2_border_a=0.100
shapecode_3_enabled=0
shapecode_3_sides=4
shapecode_3_additive=0
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=1
shapecode_3_x=0.500
shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=0.10000
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=//keep q1 negative, that's where the interesting shape is
per_frame_2=q1= -abs(1*sin(time*0.3));
per_frame_3=q2= 1*sin(time*0.45);
per_frame_4=q3= 1*cos(time*0.6);
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=
per_frame_7=wave_r = wave_r + 0.45*(0.6*sin(time*1.3) + 0.4*sin(0.98*time));
per_frame_8=wave_b = wave_b + 0.45*(0.6*sin(time*1.1) + 0.4*sin(0.78*time));
per_frame_9=wave_g = wave_g + 0.45*(0.6*sin(time*1.2) + 0.4*sin(0.6*time));
per_frame_10=
per_frame_11=//q8=wave_r;
per_frame_12=//q7=wave_g;
per_frame_13=//q6=wave_b;
per_frame_14=q8=1;
per_frame_15=q7=1;
per_frame_16=q6=1;
warp_1=`sampler sampler_pw_noise_lq;
warp_2=`float dx,dy,rad1,mask1;
warp_3=`float2 uv0, uv1,uv4,rsk, Kugel1,dz1;
warp_4=`
warp_5=`shader_body {
warp_6=`uv0 = uv;
warp_7=`
warp_8=`float2 uv1 = float2(uv.x,uv.y+texsize.w*3);
warp_9=`ret = GetPixel(uv1);
warp_10=`
warp_11=`float fak = exp(-2*lum(GetBlur2(uv_orig)));
warp_12=`ret = (GetBlur2(uv))*fak-.003 ;
warp_13=`
warp_14=`float3 add = GetPixel(uv)*.3;
warp_15=`ret = max(ret,add);
warp_16=`//ret = 0;
warp_17=`}
comp_1=`sampler sampler_pw_noise_lq;
comp_2=`float2 uv0, uv1, uv2,uv4,rsk,dz1,Kugel1;;
comp_3=`static const float sw1 =  (rand_preset.x) >= .4;
comp_4=`static const float sw2 =  (rand_preset.y);
comp_5=`
comp_6=`shader_body {
comp_7=`uv0 = uv;
comp_8=`uv2 = float2(.2/rad+time/4,ang/3.14)*2;
comp_9=`float mod = length(sin(uv2*3.141/2+time*.1));
comp_10=`float2 noise = tex2D (sampler_noise_hq,uv2+mod).rg;
comp_11=`float mask = (noise.r <= sw2);
comp_12=`float2 rohr = sw1*rad * (noise-.5) /2*mask;
comp_13=`
comp_14=`uv1 = float2(1-uv.x,uv.y);
comp_15=`ret =  GetPixel(uv)+GetPixel(uv1);
comp_16=`
comp_17=`float3 back = .2*(.5+(uv.x-.5)*q1+(uv.y-.5)*q2);
comp_18=`uv+= rohr * sw1;
comp_19=`
comp_20=`uv1 = float2(1-uv.x,uv.y);
comp_21=`ret += (GetBlur2(uv) + GetBlur2(uv1)) *min(.5+treb_att/4,2) *(1+1*sw1) * saturate(1-lum(ret)/2);
comp_22=`ret += !sw1*back;
comp_23=`ret = lerp(ret*(hue_shader*2-1),ret,lum(ret));;
comp_24=`//ret = GetPixel(uv);
comp_25=`}
